content.detailedDescription: We had just gotten on i-95 north in augusta, maine, at exit 109.  the sky was clear.  it was dusk.  the sky was still bluish pink from the sunsetting.  we all noticed something hovering in the sky on the opposite side of the highway in front of us.  it was triangular.  it was not moving.  at each vertex of the triangle there was a white light.  the three lights appeared equidistant from each other.  we could see a flat bottom and the light allowed us to see a 90 degree angle where the bottom met the edges that then moved up to give the object height.  most of us couldn’t stop looking at the edges because they were not anything like any aircraft that we are familiar with.  we could see that the object was a flat metal color.  it had no shine to it.  where the light hit the object, it looked like a tin color.  there were no color lights at all.  my wife was driving, but she could see it out her window, but not for as long as i could see it from the passenger seat.  my three children were in the backseat.  all three children saw the object.  i saw it out the front window first, then through the back window, and then i took off my seatbelt and stuck my head out the roof through the sunroof.  when i stuck my head out the roof, i could not hear anything more than the wind caused by driving.  no airplane sound at all, at anytime.  the object never moved, it just hovered.  my wife was afraid to pull over, so we lost sight of it as we drove away.   we do not look for ufo’s.  this object was so out of place that it was difficult for us not to notice it.  all of us noticed it at the same time, and we were all in shock as we starred at it for as long as we could.  my daughter even became frightened; it was that real to her.  i did not try to take a photo because there was not enough time, and i would have lost a lot of the time i had to observe it.  all we had was our cell phones, and we didn't think a cell phone picture would have shown anything more than the lights, so we just watched the object as we drove away from it.
content.summary: Hovering triangular ufo

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to use the phone and immediately saw lights flashing in the sky to the northeast. at first dismissed it as a plane but realized it wasn't moving and that the lights were far too many colors to be an aircraft's. i walked toward it out in the field and saw it was a dark dome type structure that appeared to be spinning counter clockwise with a band or ring of lights around it spinning in a clockwise direction. the lights were flashing sequentially, like christmas lights. there seemed to be one large strobe type light pulsing near the bottom of the craft and multicolored smaller lights around it like the rings around saturn. it was hovering and as i moved closer it started moving up and down as if it was bouncing and then went back to hovering. it repeated these movements several times and then went back to hovering. the horses in the field were acting agitated and running around in circles. this went on for an hour. suddenly, a helicopter approached from the southeast directly headed for the craft. the craft moved straight up into the sky and the lights got extremely bright and began flashing rapidly and non sequentially and then the craft just disappeared like it was never there. the helicopter circled around the area a couple times. i got really nervous so i went back inside. i snapped several shots on my cell phone camera but it was too dark for them to show up.
content.summary: Walked outside to use the phone & saw flashing lights. at first thought it was an aircraft but realized it was hovering in the same spot. was spinning with a ring of lights also spinning in the opposite direction. took several pics but was too dark.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard, looking in my telescope with my brother. ten i went inside and i look. it looked like a ufo to me and my brother. it was moving slowly and going -ne- from my house and had white-red lights and medium-sized ufo. me and my brother freaked out we were running back inside before it noticed us and locked all the doors and prayed to god that it would be gone.Then it was gone out of sight and my neighbors were looking outside to see what happened.
content.summary: Slowing moving ne and freaked me out.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my apartment, and went for a look at the balcony. it was night already, and it was full moon. i looked to the sky to see the moon and notice this flying small object, he turned directions, went up, down, left and right, and also stayed stoped for sometimes. i knew it was something i had never seen, and could be a drone probably, but i dont know. i filmed with my camera, and he went behind some building, so i lost it from sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blue light object, that turned the lights off and on, he alternates with red and blue lights, than no lights. changed all directions.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:05 i was driving north on highway 93 at around exit 34 at aprox 65 mph. as i came up on the cell tower on the south bound side up on the hill i noticed a triangular shaped object with hooked points flashing (they changed every 2 seconds) randomly green and red lights from all 4 points. it hovered west to east from the cell tower and then went back east to west. very methodical and smooth. this almost looked drone like but was definitely bigger then a car but smaller then a plane. i lost it after i drove under it and could not catch it in my review or side mirrors. the highway was definitely busy so i hope other saw this as well
content.summary: Triangle shapped object with winged bottom point flashed green and red lights randomly on all 4 points

content.detailedDescription: We were standing outside sunday night, just looking at sky. noticed strange far away lights high in the sky, just hovering, red and green. got my wife and we both watched and got binoculars and saw green, then red and white. they changed colors randomly and sometimes got brighter. the first was over the northeast sky over lake erie and then we noticed 2 more sets of the same lights. these were in a line across from the first noticed lights. the one directly north and the third one, northwest sky. we checked flight aware and there were maybe 2 commercial jets, but we saw those flying over. we did notice some other jets go by these lights, wondering if they were military due to speed and seeing their afterburners and they were quite high. (there is a air national guard base with jets 30 miles west of us). they went back and and forth a couple of times. when the jets went by the strange lights, they seemed to get brighter and more white. the jets went below and above the colored lights. this did scare us a bit, but we had to go in and go to bed, we both work early in morning. we watched this for about 1 1/2 hours or so. the northwest lights eventually just disappeared, we never saw them leave. the lights directly north seemed to get higher in the sky, however, very slowly. the northeast set of lights seemed to rise in the sky and move a little more west, but not very far. both of these sets of lights were still in the sky when we went to bed. we were bothered and a little scared of what we saw. anxious and excited to see these.
content.summary: Notice circle of lights far away in northwest, north and northeast sky, red and green.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a meeting when i saw a bright red light in the clear sky. it was very striking and i remember thinking that it wasn't a blinking light but a stationary bright red light. i was driving south and it seemed to be traveling the same way i was. very slowly. i rounded a corner and saw it up in the sky. it stopped moving or appeared to so i stopped my car and started at it for half a minute. it was hovering. it then changed direction and started moving south east. i turned east and pulled up in a neighborhood street and stopped my car. it kept traveling se them abruptly turned e and accelerated rapidly and went to a high altitude and disappeared in the clouds.

i knew it wasn't an airplane. at first i thought it was a helicopter but it made no sound. i knew it was too advanced and i felt like it knew i was watching it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw fireball move, followed it. it started to hover, then change direction then accelerate and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on highway 4, in manitoba. i was approaching the bridge north of selkirk manitoba spanning the red river. before this bridge is a slow bend in the highway. as i was approaching the bridge, out of the bend, i saw 7 or 8 large deep orange oval lights in the sky. you couldn't miss them. as i started rising on the bridge and gaining elevation, i could see more individual lights stretching to the north horizon where there was another group of 6 or seven. i was pretty freaked out, that's why i didn't count the exact number.
   i stopped right on the top of the bridge and turned my flashers on. another car stopped on the bridge about 30 feet in front of me. we both got out and looked at this happening in the sky. i wanted to talk to this person, but he took off when the event ended. until that time we watched the lights. i had my camera, a canon 5d, and i set the iso to 6400, but it would't take the pic. it was too dark, though it was a clear night.
   the objects were so large and bright, anybody outside would have seen them. you really did not even have to look up. they were blazingly there. they wern't being secretive about it. anybody driving their car on hwy 9 north of selkirk, on hwy 9a north of selkirk and hwy 59 had to have seen them also. anybody outside would have to have seen them.
 as i said, the larger oval objects were a deep orange, about the colour of the moon on the horizon, except for one which was deep red. i wondered why the one was deep red, what was going on there? the objects were all moving from north to south, but each was an individual, all moving at various speeds. there were small red lights that would catch up and fall back from the larger orange ones. these would change direction and sort of frolic, i dont know how else to put it, with the larger orange ovals. it was like the large ones were migrating and the small red ones were like children cavorting around the larger ones. my feelings and thoughts were; what the hell am i witnessing here? what am i seeing, and why is that one deep red? those are not airplanes, helicopters, fireworks or chinese lanterns. holy mackeral, it finally happened.
   25 years of driving longhaul and i have never seen anything like it, and personally, i never believed in such things. i have been humbled. there was nothing to indicate to me that these were machines of any kind, or alien craft from another planet, which i still do not believe. however...I have no, absolutely no explanation or frame of reference, to come up with any explanation of what those were. the little red ones seemed to be moving with some sort of intelligence, though i could be projecting.The lights moved south and disappeared over the city of selkirk, manitoba. the time it took for the last ones from the horizon in the north to move south and disappear over selkirk was about two and a half, three minutes. it lasted a while, and as i said, dozens of people must have seen them.I contacted the winnipeg free press and the winnipeg sun via computer as soon as i got home about 10 minutes after midnight, and the next day contacted ctv news and cbc news, but they had received no other sighting alerts, and quite frankly, couldn't wait to hang up on me. to be fair, before this event, i would probably have had the same attitude. so there ya go. thats it. you have my name and number, though i believe i have stated everything i can about this sighting.
thank you.
content.summary: Group of 7 lights at norther horizon with odd stragglers in a rough procession to a group above me of about 6 or seven with small red ones catching up and falling back and circeling around the bigger orange ones.

content.detailedDescription:
On new year's day 1990 at around 2:00 am, my husband and i were driving back home on carretera #1 in salinas.  immediately after going over the river bridge, we observed a line of 5 red translucent orbs that appeared to be floating in the air.

my husband stopped the car abruptly, we got out of the car to observe the orbs.  for a moment we thought that the orbs were some kind of military drill from campamento santiago (army base), but quickly realized it was not something ordinary, as the orbs were completely silent while hovering.

we continued to observe the orbs for about a minute or so, then the orbs turned north west (single file) and ascended in an incredible speed towards the sky, took 5 to 10 seconds until we could no longer see them in the sky with naked eyes; all while not making any kind of sound.

the experience left us confused, almost in a shock state.  have never seen anything like it before or since.
content.summary: Line of 5 red orbs hovering near the river.  orbs were silent even at movement.

content.detailedDescription: The 2 large bright lights appeared at what seemed to be the top of the object. there were many smaller lights below that put off a tremendous amount of glowing light. it almost looked like a very large crash guard on the front of a semi-truck. the interstate hwy was running perpendicular to the object and there weren't any other roads in the area of travel of the object. also, the object was far to large to travel on any road or highway. the object appeared coming over the top of a local 3 or 4 story hotel. it was either moving toward my location or coming up off the ground. i am a licensed airframe & powerplant mechanic and have been around airports and all types of aircraft and have never experienced anything of this sort. the object was there for 10 to 15 seconds and seemed to speed away a very high rate of acceleration.
content.summary: 2 large white lights then many other bright glowing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding the bus from kristianstad to osbyholm while looking out the window when i saw something i thought at first looked like a giant, refective balloon. upon staring at it a bit longer i was all: "that's no balloon...."
i stared at it for a good 20 seconds before it faded into nothing. never saw it again... but what i did see though, not even a minute after this happened was a google car with a camera or whatever on the roof drive past. coincidence? never seen one before. never seen a ufo before. weird i saw them both at almost the same time.
content.summary: Oval shaped reflective flying very slowly then fades out of existance

content.detailedDescription:
We live in a rural high desert area of arizona where the night sky is clear and every star can be seen with brightness. on this particular night, i happened to be looking up and saw an object streaking across the sky at a height that satellites are normally seen.  it was not a satellite because it was traveling at a rate of speed that i estimate being over 2000 mph, using a commercial airliner as a gauge with normal speed being around 600 mph.  it was going at least four times faster than a plane, at that speed.  
   it was traveling due north, like a shooting star but not burning out when without slowing down, it made an abrupt 90 degree turn and headed due east.
   to my knowledge, we have nothing created or invented that could travel at the speed of this object, let alone maneuver a 90 degree turn without a wide sweeping curve.  
   it continued the easterly path until out of site. no further information.
   i have seen ufo's including saucer type on at least three occasions during my life, but nothing like this object which obviously was being guided or flown with purpose and direction.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: I was just out side day time i saw this floating silver craft moving in crazy patterns then it stops but before that i taped the witness cause what i saw was crazy but he is dead now. but when it stopped mile an half above us it then looked down an saw us 2 people or things i saw through the window then it dipped out on us faster then a airplane. note i was 12 2 13 years old at the time just now reporting this now because i have a computer now. how i felt amazed that no jets just seemed to float. i hope u can change the goverments with this i feel we are being lied too about this an everything else hope this helps.
content.summary: I saw 2 people in a silver floating craft above me

content.detailedDescription: I was approximately 11 to 13 years old and my step-father asked me to take the mail to put in the mailbox...Remember it was late and already dark outside so was a little scared...Ran to the mailbox...Put the mail in and pulled the flag up and running back up to the house and was almost there when this huge light was to my left above the tall pine trees...Was glowing orangish color and moving extremely slowly in the same direction of the pine trees...(the pine trees were planted in a straight line on the edge of the driveway)..Can remember standing(almost frozen in place)staring at this thing and then it was like my mind kicked back in and i ran back into the house....Never told anyone about this until years later when i met my husband and then to an administrator on the facebook mufon site...Who encouraged me to report it here.  don't recall thinking about what it could have been...Just knew it was not right to see and remember being scared and running back into the house...Did not lose sight of the object...When i finally could run....I did...
content.summary: {nd} a huge orangish-yellow circle glowing at night right above the pine trees..Moving slowly in the same direction of the trees...

content.detailedDescription:
I was up at 4am and saw another bright star on the air field. this is my 2nd sitting on the air since living here. i am a pro photographer so i grabbed my camera took photo+video this time with a canon 7d camera and my 70-200 zoom lens.
i filmed it hovering and got some shots if the craft. it looked like something out of an old 1950's sci-fi film. it was a disk shaped craft with rounded colored lights that blinked red, green white and blue. i got several photos of it and when i zoomed into the shot the colors were windows with shadows back lit that looked like greys. i was shocked to see this and kept filming with my camera. i had it zoomed 200 focal lengthy but with this camera due to the sensor it makes that distance about to a 300 focal length, the aliens inside had very dark eyes seemed short and had awful posture from what i could see in the one zoomed shot. i believe the light refracted off the craft so i could see them in the shot. they seemed to be facing each other and one looked like it was driving something that looked like a submarine viewfinder or something. i was shocked i even got photos if this when i 10x zoomed into the shot all the other photos are on my camera as well as the videos.  the ufo was very far away so it was tricky to focus but i got some good shots when i had my tripod.
the ufo itself went from 10 o'clock to about 1o'clock over an hour period.
was hovering and every time i looked at it, i immediately got this thought, don't look at us we are just a bright star. ummm clearly not.
content.summary: 2nd report. was up late again & saw at 10 o'clock a bright looking star. i put on my glasses &  saw it was pulsing red, green, and white and just hovering over the air field again. i am a pro photographer so i grabbed my camera took photo+video

content.detailedDescription:
3 star like ufo's no doubt' the 2 on sides drop down then shot off apart, center stayed for 8 min, flasing code like. they were bigger and closer than stars yet resembled stars. a min before the center one disapeared i seen a glowing red flashing star like ufo far to the left, west, then they both just disapeared. the night was very clear and few if any stars in this area.
that's it! i know for a fact this was not normal, can't say what it was but my geuss is not of our world. we tried to film it but our damn phone camera would not show it, too far away i guess?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 star like ufo's no doubt' the 2 on sides drop down then shot off apart, center stayed for 8 min, flasing code like

content.detailedDescription: I took out the trash at 0400 and saw a meteor (perseids) and decided to stay for more. i was in ne albuquerque, nm, looking up facing ne. i saw a bright white star just above me. at first i thought it was a plane, but it was too high and did not have the flashing colored lights on the bottom. it was moving at a steady pace. it then flashed a brighter white, a pure white. the flash made it seem two to three times bigger than it was. it continued south for a few seconds then disappeared into a darker section of sky. i was excited and frightened at the same time, frozen. i wanted to stay out and search for it, but felt that i should go inside. once inside, i felt anxious and scared. i looked at the clock and it was 0406.
content.summary: Albuquerque bright starlike light moving from n -s flare of white light  then gone

content.detailedDescription:
Late saturday night, 9/6/14, approx. 11:45 pm, i went to a neighbor's house to potty their dogs before bedtime. i led the dogs to their long back yard, grass in middle (where we were), and a crop of 75 foot tall trees in back of the yard. clear skies. i looked above treeline to admire the almost full moon and saw a glowing red oval sphere coming from behind the trees to the left (east) and crossing the sky just above the treeline. hard to estimate how far away it was with no sense of its size, but my impression was about 1/2 mile away. it seemed to be a solid, dense object, not just a light or orb - but the whole object glowed with an intense orange-y red light. very bright, like a large rounded car tail-light in the sky. there seemed to be a subtle darker line down the middle of the object, horizontally. and at the last second before i lost it, it seemed like i could also see a kind of swirling, churning at the middle of the object - some sort of rotation or flow of the color/light. almost "molten" looking or liquid.

it moved across the sky about the same pace as a commercial jet at cruising speed (600/700 mph). it took about 10 seconds to cross the opening in the trees. as i was watching it, i kept thinking i would see or hear something soon that would explain what it really was. but that never happened. the light never blinked or strobed (like an airplane's night lights would) and i knew i should be seeing white or green blinking lights too if it was conventional aircraft (and it would be a green light facing me going left to right anyway, not red). and it was pretty close or really large (if you held a pea at arm's length, you would get a sense of the size as i saw it). but i couldn't hear any motor or engine. just the crickets in the woods.

it eventually got to a denser cluster of trees to my right and it disappeared from my sight (it should've come out a little further along at another opening, but didn't, so maybe it turned sharply south and away from me. or descended. i don't know). 

i went back to the same house the next afternoon, and took a picture of the same section of woods in the daylight - then used the computer to make a re-creation of what i saw. (see attached picture). good thing that large tree in the middle is dead, or i wouldn't have seen it much at all!
content.summary: Glowing red-orange oval sphere flew above treetop sightline

content.detailedDescription: Thursday night sept.7 at about 7 to 8 i was on the bokeelia pier snapping pics of the sunset. we did not see anything. the next day i looked at the pics and discovered a bright light, zoomed in and it was a bright white round light with a light bluish vapor trail., falling straight down, the next pic showed the same bright white ball, and a huge red planet looking object behind it, the clouds can be seen in front of both objects, next pic shows the bright white ball still falling but the red ball was then a vapor streaking north west, i have a several pics.
content.summary: Snapped several pics of sunset, photo shows objects behind clouds one bright one extreamly large red planet looking, pic, show solid outline then next pic shows bright white desending & red vapor assending nw, bright white continued down to the

content.detailedDescription: The only time you see these type of things is when you have a really good (trip) on acid. trust me iv seen things to cx
content.summary: I was doin some acid an idk wat was goin on cx

content.detailedDescription: We were taking my friend & her kids home after a long day at the lake. all of a sudden my boyfriend tell us to look at the sky and we saw the triangular shaped object. i have never seen such thing in my life. it wasn't an airplane, i mean i see them everyday all day. before i started recording it was still, then it's just started moving up and down. we pulled over so that i can record it and it stood still again. a minute later it started flying forward and it disappears behind the trees. it was awesome, yes we were scared but at the same time it was exiting.
content.summary: Incredible ufo

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and looked at the sun at around 12:00 pm sept 7, 2014. i noticed these bright orbs around the sun right away and called my wife to come and verify. she say them right away. we blocked the sun out with our roof. just before we were blinded by the sun, the roof protected our eyes and you could see these star like dots in the sky. dozens of them flying around. some would get brighter. they would zip away. from all directions. there was a lot of commercial airplane activity and it looked like some of the orbs would go and check out the planes. it was incredible. we have many videos of this event. this went on for over 3 hours. i called many people and they saw them as well. i contacted nick pope in the uk and he verified the anomalies from my video as well. we watched the orbs for over an hour then we had to go to hockey practice. when we came back, they were still in the sky. i was extremely excited. my wife and kids were as well. we feel really fortunate to have witnessed this event. i will be looking again today. i left mufon a phone message at the time this was happening.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like stars buzzing around the sun. changed directions. some bigger and brighter than others.

content.detailedDescription:
This at first appeared to be a plane that was simply flying parallel to ours, but then it veered away from us over the western arizona desert and appeared to descend and “land” as i looked back at it. but the object’s extremely bright lights, which sometimes were 4, 3 or 2 in number, stayed on even after it appeared to “land.” 

in the photo, the lights have descended to (or near) the ground.
content.summary: Seen from southwest airlines flight from san diego to denver. flew parallel to us, then descended & appeared to land. extremely bright lights stayed on after apparent landing.

content.detailedDescription: While working as a security guard i went outside to stretch my legs it was then that i noticed a strange like orb making strange manovers.I went and got my camcorder and recorded it ,suddenly it was gone .I then looked to my e/w direction and there was a strange object coming my way it moved so fast it was there about 100 feeet above me .It was a clear night stars visable very little cloud .Then it was like it saw me and there was a flash from both  sides it had a large red oval shaped light underneath there was no sound and when it excelerated  straight up it vanished in a second.I felt that i had seen something not manmade and not from this planet.I served in the military and know planes helicopters chinese lanterns etc.This was fascinating and i did not tell my family for a while .
content.summary: Came at incredable speed from s/w moving s/e then went straight up aat such a speed

content.detailedDescription: Red orb. i thought it was a satellite ot airplane but there was no flashing and it changed direction quickly. about 5 to 10 seconds after the direction change it vanished. it was on the twin span over lake ponchatrain. this is the 5th ufo i have ever seen n im certain it was not an airplane or satellite. hope someone else seen it. peace.
content.summary: Red orb moving slowly left. turned quick headimg straight away from me. it then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Its july 4th, 2014 in downingtown, pa at about 9pm, or whenever it got dark enough for fireworks. i was in kerr park waiting for the fireworks to begin. im bored and playing on my phone when my friend grabs me, points at the sky and says: "wtf is that?". i turned around to see 12 orange/red (more orange than red) orb like objects traveling above and following route 322 westward. they seemed to glow rather than shine light (if that makes sense). its like the light was contained within itself, not really giving off light. i'm having difficulty describing it. it was just so strange and unnatural. when i saw them they were above the intersection of routes 30 and 322 in downingtown, pa. the lowest one seemed to be a little over 50ft above the trees. they were all in a formation. it kinda reminded me of the german luftwaffe in old ww2 movies. the first 5 seemed to be flying at different altitudes an equal distance from each other. they were also positioned sort of caddy-corner in a straight line from the highest altitude to the lowest. the sixth one was moving up and down behind the first five never going above the highest altitude or the lowest like an escort. this was followed by 6 more doing the same as the first 6. all 12 moved forward at a speed that was just too slow for airplanes to fly. people around me started getting excited, then a lady next to me said they were wedding lights and just like that nobody cared anymore. what kind of wedding lights can hold perfect formation and a perfect repetitive flight pattern? i even thought maybe they tied strings to them to keep them together but with wind in the sky i don't see them holding position. and, if they were wedding lights, how could two of them move up and down without the other 10 moving out of formation, or even move up and down? heat travels up. with this being on the 4th of july i dont see anyone taking me seriously. thats why i waited until september to report it. i didn't try to follow them, even though i should of.  what am i gonna do? they're up there and i'm stuck down here. when they flew past us and disappeared beyond the tree line everything went back to normal, like nothing ever happened.  my pos boost mobile phone's camera doesn't have the ability to make out objects beyond ~100ft away, so no pictures and no videos. besides my friend, i don't know any of the other witnesses and have no way to find them. if you visit [link moved to fi section/cms/tg] and look at #11, it looks identical to one of the orb-lke ufo's i saw.
content.summary: Orange lights over downingtown, pa

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and walked outside to help my husband in the yard.  he was weed eating the yard.  that's the noise you hear in the video.  our nephew was standing beside me and i looked up and saw this white object in the sky.  i asked my nephew if he seen it and he looked up and said yeah, what is that?  i then got my phone out and starting filming it. it was just slowly going in a straight line.  it wasn't shaped like a plane our helicopter our blimp.   i didn't get much off it because it went behind the tree line and i lost it.  i tried walking around the trees and could not find it again.  i really just want to know what this is.  thanks
content.summary: I notice a white object in the sky.  no sounds coming from it.

content.detailedDescription:
Statement of law enforcement officer received by james e clarkson on 07/13/2014. he contacted me and related this account on the basis that his identity would be protected. i spent substantial time interviewing him and i am convinced that this is a true high strangeness event: highly credible witness reporting an extraordinary aerial vehicle that demonstrated performance characteristics that are either extremely advanced and most probably classified military technology or it is non-human intelligence of unknown origin. further, there is now radar confirmation.

witness statement:
on july 2, 2014, at approximately 1300 hours, i was on-duty and near the intersection of (location deleted by jc), vancouver, washington.  the weather was warm, with excellent visibility, and a partly cloudy sky.  i was in my vehicle, facing east, toward (deleted).  my window was rolled down, providing me with an unobstructed view of the southern and eastern sky.
 i noticed movement in the sky, approximately forty-five degrees above the horizon, to the southeast.  i observed a metallic disc, silver-in-color and circular in shape, moving rapidly across the sky from the south to the northeast.  this movement was from my right to my left.
 the object was shiny and glinted in the sun as it moved.  it appeared to be several thousand feet in elevation, and from my perspective, appeared to be the size of a dime held at arms-length.  i heard no sound at all from the object, and there was no contrail.  further, it looked uniformly metallic and circular, with no visible wings, tail, windows, lights, landing gear, or other components of conventional airframes, both rotor and fixed-wing.  it also did not look similar to any unmanned aerial vehicles i have observed.
 i observed the object travel up and to my left, which was north/northeast.  i saw it increase in elevation rapidly in a straight line, and it appeared to be travelling faster than any conventional aircraft.  after approximately five seconds, i observed the leading edge of the object shimmer and disappear.  i observed this continue, as an image of the surrounding blue sky enveloped the object, moving in a vertical line across the surface to the rear edge, until the object blended in with the sky behind it.  
 as this change occurred, i observed a slight blurriness in the changed areas, inconsistent with the sky behind it.  this distortion was similar to looking at an object immersed in water.  however, once the entire object had changed, this effect stopped and i immediately lost sight of the object.  the time from complete visibility to disappearance was approximately two to three seconds.
 at the time of disappearance, the surrounding sky was blue and cloudless.  i continued looking but was unable to find the object.  approximately thirty seconds later, i observed a jet fighter aircraft flying rapidly along the same course the disc had taken.  i recognized this aircraft, based on prior experience, to be an f-15.  i was only able to observe the bottom of the aircraft, and no insignia were visible, but it looked identical to the f-15 fighters based at the portland air national guard base.  
 i observed the f-15 follow the same flight path, moving from my right to upper left.  it continued, flying beyond where i had last seen the object, but in the same direction and elevation.  from my perspective, the f-15 was the approximate size of a quarter held at arms-length.  additionally, the f-15 was extremely loud while passing over, whereas the disc was silent.  i observed the f-15 continue to the northeast, out of my line of sight.  
 based on my training and experience, this was no known military or civilian aircraft, unmanned aerial vehicle, astronomical phenomenon, balloon, atmospheric effect, or misidentification of a known object.  this object was a real, physical, tangible craft, and it exhibited flight characteristics at least comparable to a military fighter aircraft.  further, the object's ability to adopt complete camouflage, which was capable of effectively mirroring the surrounding environment, is a capability which to my knowledge has not been successfully developed or implemented.  nothing further. 
note: radar data has been obtained and analyzed that confirms this account; i was assisted by  [item moved/cms/nd] . i will be adding his report. also, investigation continues.
content.summary: Witness obs silver disc that ascends and disappears; f-15 follows same course moments later.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and 10 year old son were sitting around a fire pit, 30 feet from the lake, at about 10 at night.   we were on the west shore, just south of the bridge, in the hadley bay area.   i noted a small orange/red light to the north east.   it was just over the distant tree line and seemed to be stationary - i could not tell how far away it was.   i asked the others if they thought it was a star, planet or plane, and they thought plane, as 'stars don't twinkle like that'.   it didn't seem to be moving, so i figured it was a plane or helicopter coming towards us, but after several minutes it was still in the same place - it might have moved a bit to the west.   after 5 minutes or so a second, identical light rose up from behind the trees and hovered next to the first one - or at least it seemed to - it might have been farther or closer away.   after another 5 minutes i saw a third light approaching from the west - the first two quickly faded out, and when i then looked for the new, third light, it too was gone.
content.summary: Pulsating orange/red light hovered over tree line - joined by another.

content.detailedDescription:
I has just turned off all of the lights in the house and was on my way to bed, then i walked back into the living room in the darkness to pick something up when i spotted the unnatural orange-red light through the front window hovering over the lake.

the sky was dark so it really caught my eye.  i watched it move up and down a bit before i woke my mother up and told her she wouldn't want to miss seeing this. over the course of about an hour, the light moved up and down, to the right very quickly. it also disappeared and reappeared changing in size and brightness.  there were two other lights that also appeared but didn't stay long.  i did get a picture of two lights but not all three.

i tried taking pictures of it with my camera and my iphone.  it is difficult to focus on a ball of light behind a cloud over water in the dark, so the best pictures are where i tried to focus on the reflection it made in the water below.

it was a very unusual thing to watch.  i have never seen anything quite like it before and doubt i will see anything like it again. the moon was on one side of the house and the lights over the lake were it wasn't the moon that we saw.  the moon was on the other side of the house, we have no idea what those lights were.
content.summary: Three balls of light over lake winnipeg at 12:30 am, sept 5, 2014.
